'''Wiruin''' was a great whirlpool located in a bay near where the [[Helkaraksë]] jutted out from the [[araman|western mainland]].<ref name=flight>{{LT1|VII}}</ref> It only appears within ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''.

It was a fearsome eddy which shrieked with a loud wailing noise that was terrible to hear; anything that approached was sucked down into its depths and crushed upon ice and rock.<ref name=flight />

When the [[Noldoli]] on their [[Exile of the Noldor|Exile]] reached the Helkaraksë, some elected to attempt to sail across the [[Great Sea|sea]] rather than cross the frozen isthmus. In this, a great ship was lost with all aboard by being sucked into Wiruin. The Noldoli were therefore forced to cross by land.<ref name=flight />
